name: 4Ever Face Wash Aloe Lavender
description: Enriched with lunuwila extracts, minerals and vitamins, this gentle face wash thoroughly cleanses and purifies while preserving the moisture of the skin. Formulated to skin pH of 5.5 – 6.0, this face wash nourishes, whitens and helps keep the skin light and fresh. Preferred for normal to dry skin. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
